00019 #ifndef _POINT2D_H

00037 template<class T>
00038 class CPoint2D
00039 {
00040         protected: // attributes
00042                 T m_x;
00044                 T m_y;
00045         public: // methods
00047                 CPoint2D();
00049                 CPoint2D(T x,T y);
00051                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint2D(const CPoint2D<POLY>& P2D){m_x=P2D.GetX();m_y=P2D.GetY();}
00053                 CPoint2D(const CPoint2D<T>& P2D);
00055                 ~CPoint2D();
00056 
00058                 template<class POLY> operator CPoint2D<POLY>(){return CPoint2D<POLY>(m_x,m_y);}
00059 
00062 
00063                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint2D<T>& operator=(const CPoint2D<POLY>& P2D){m_x=P2D.GetX();m_y=P2D.GetY();return *this;};
00065                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint2D<T>& operator+=(const CPoint2D<POLY>& P2D){m_x+=P2D.GetX();m_y+=P2D.GetY();return *this;};
00067                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint2D<T>& operator-=(const CPoint2D<POLY>& P2D){m_x-=P2D.GetX();m_y-=P2D.GetY();return *this;};
00070                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint2D<T>& operator*=(const POLY& Factor){m_x*=Factor;m_y*=Factor;return *this;}
00073                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint2D<T>& operator/=(const POLY& Factor){m_x/=Factor;m_y/=Factor;return *this;}
00075 
00077 
00078                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator==(const CPoint2D<POLY>& P2D) const{return ((m_x==P2D.GetX()) && (m_y==P2D.GetY()));}
00080                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator!=(const CPoint2D<POLY>& P2D) const{return ((m_x!=P2D.GetX()) || (m_y!=P2D.GetY()));}
00082                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator<(const CPoint2D<POLY>& P2D) const{if (m_x==P2D.GetX()){return (m_y<P2D.GetY());}else{return (m_x<P2D.GetX());}}
00084                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator<=(const CPoint2D<POLY>& P2D) const{if (m_x==P2D.GetX()){return (m_y<=P2D.GetY());}else{return (m_x<P2D.GetX());}}
00086                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator>(const CPoint2D<POLY>& P2D) const{if (m_x==P2D.GetX()){return (m_y>P2D.GetY());}else{return (m_x>P2D.GetX());}}
00088                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator>=(const CPoint2D<POLY>& P2D) const{if (m_x==P2D.GetX()){return (m_y>=P2D.GetY());}else{return (m_x>P2D.GetX());}}
00090 
00092 
00093                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint2D<T> operator+(const CPoint2D<POLY>& P2D) const {return CPoint2D<T>(m_x+P2D.GetX(),m_y+P2D.GetY());}
00095                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint2D<T> operator-(const CPoint2D<POLY>& P2D) const {return CPoint2D<T>(m_x-P2D.GetX(),m_y-P2D.GetY());}
00098                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint2D<T> operator*(const POLY& Factor) const {return CPoint2D<T>(m_x*Factor,m_y*Factor);}
00101                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint2D<T> operator/(const POLY& Factor) const {return CPoint2D<T>(m_x/Factor,m_y/Factor);}
00103 
00106                 friend CPoint2D<T> operator*(const T& Factor,const CPoint2D& P2D){return CPoint2D<T>(P2D.m_x*Factor, P2D.m_y*Factor);}
00107 
00108                 // other methods
00110                 inline void Add(const T x, const T y);
00112                 inline void AddX(const T x);
00114                 inline void AddY(const T y);
00116                 inline void Sub(const T x, const T y);
00118                 inline void SubX(const T x);
00120                 inline void SubY(const T y);
00122                 inline void Get(T& x, T& y) const;
00124                 inline T GetX() const;
00126                 inline T GetY() const;
00128                 inline void Set(const T x, const T y);
00130                 inline void SetX(const T x);
00132                 inline void SetY(const T y);
00136                 inline bool IsZero() const;
00144                 inline bool IsZero(T Zero) const;
00148                 inline CPoint2D<T>& ZeroAdjust(const T& Zero);
00152                 inline double GetDist(const CPoint2D<T>& P2D=CPoint2D<T>(0,0)) const;
00161                 inline void Rotate(double Rad);
00166                 inline void RotatePi();
00167                 // info methods
00169                 void Print() const;
00173                 friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& s,const CPoint2D<T>& P2D){return s << "(" << P2D.m_x << "," << P2D.m_y << ")";}
00174 
00181                 friend std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& is, CPoint2D<T>& P2D)
00182                 {
00183                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00184                         is.get(); // eat '('
00185                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00186                         is >> P2D.m_x;
00187                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00188                         is.get(); // eat ','
00189                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00190                         is >> P2D.m_y;
00191                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00192                         is.get(); // eat ')'
00193                         return is;                      
00194                 }
00195 
00204                 virtual inline std::istream& operator<<(std::istream& s);               
00206         public: // methods
00209                 static inline void SkipSpaceAndComments(std::istream& s)
00210                 {
00211                         while(isspace(s.peek()))
00212                                 s.get();
00213                         while (s.peek()=='#')
00214                         {
00215                                 s.ignore(std::numeric_limits<int>::max(),'\n');
00216                                 while (isspace(s.peek()))
00217                                         s.get();
00218                         }
00219                 }
00220 };

00244 template <class T>
00245 inline void CPoint2D<T>::Add(const T x, const T y)
00246 {
00247         m_x +=x;
00248         m_y +=y;
00249 }
00250 
00251 template <class T>
00252 inline void CPoint2D<T>::AddX(const T x)
00253 {
00254         // add "x" to current x-value
00255         m_x += x;
00256 }
00257 
00258 template <class T>
00259 inline void CPoint2D<T>::AddY(const T y)
00260 {
00261         // add "y" to current y-value
00262         m_y += y;
00263 }
00264 
00265 template <class T>
00266 inline void CPoint2D<T>::Sub(const T x, const T y)
00267 {
00268         m_x -= x;
00269         m_y -= y;
00270 }
00271 
00272 template <class T>
00273 inline void CPoint2D<T>::SubX(const T x)
00274 {
00275         // sub "x" from current x-value
00276         m_x -= x;
00277 }
00278 
00279 template <class T>
00280 inline void CPoint2D<T>::SubY(const T y)
00281 {
00282         // sub "y" from current y-value
00283         m_y -= y;
00284 }

00287 inline void CPoint2D<T>::Get(T& x, T& y) const
00288 {
00289         x=m_x;
00290         y=m_y;
00291 }

00328 template <class T>
00329 inline bool CPoint2D<T>::IsZero() const
00330 {
00331         return ((m_x==T(0)) && (m_y==T(0)));
00332 }
00333 
00334 template <class T>
00335 inline bool CPoint2D<T>::IsZero(T Zero) const
00336 {
00337         return ((m_x<Zero) && (m_x>-Zero) && (m_y<Zero) && (m_y>-Zero));
00338 }
00339 
00340 template <class T>
00341 inline CPoint2D<T>& CPoint2D<T>::ZeroAdjust(const T& Zero)
00342 {
00343         if (m_x<Zero)
00344                 m_x=T(0);
00345         if (m_y<Zero)
00346                 m_y=T(0);
00347         return *this;
00348 }
00349 
00350 template <class T>
00351 inline double CPoint2D<T>::GetDist(const CPoint2D<T>& P2D) const
00352 {
00353         // return distance between two points
00354         T distX= m_x>P2D.GetX() ? m_x-P2D.GetX() : P2D.GetX()-m_x;
00355         T distY= m_y>P2D.GetY() ? m_y-P2D.GetY() : P2D.GetY()-m_y;
00356         return sqrt(distX*distX+distY*distY);
00357 }
00358 
00359 template <class T>
00360 inline void CPoint2D<T>::Rotate(double Rad)
00361 {
00362         double cosa=cos(Rad);
00363         double sina=sin(Rad);
00364 //      double x = m_x*cosa + m_y*sina;
00365 //      m_y = m_x*sina - m_y*cosa;
00366 //      m_x=x;
00367         double x = m_x*cosa + m_y*sina;
00368         double y = m_y*cosa - m_x*sina;
00369         m_x=(T)x;
00370         m_y=(T)y;
00371 }
00372 
00373 template <class T>
00374 inline void CPoint2D<T>::RotatePi()
00375 {
00376         m_x=-m_x;
00377         m_y=-m_y;
00378 }
00379 
00380 template <class T>
00381 inline std::istream& CPoint2D<T>::operator<<(std::istream& s)
00382 {
00383         while(isspace(s.peek())){s.get();}while (s.peek()=='#'){s.ignore(500,'\n');while (isspace(s.peek())){s.get();}} 
00384         s.get(); // eat '('
00385         while(isspace(s.peek())){s.get();}while (s.peek()=='#'){s.ignore(500,'\n');while (isspace(s.peek())){s.get();}} 
00386         s >> m_x;
00387         while(isspace(s.peek())){s.get();}while (s.peek()=='#'){s.ignore(500,'\n');while (isspace(s.peek())){s.get();}} 
00388         s.get(); // eat ','
00389         while(isspace(s.peek())){s.get();}while (s.peek()=='#'){s.ignore(500,'\n');while (isspace(s.peek())){s.get();}} 
00390         s >> m_y;
00391         while(isspace(s.peek())){s.get();}while (s.peek()=='#'){s.ignore(500,'\n');while (isspace(s.peek())){s.get();}} 
00392         s.get(); // eat ')'
00393         return s;
00394 }
